name: Hickory Hideaway

reviews.text: Immaculate cabins, many with full kitchens, on an extremely well run, family property. Northwestern Illinois, just east of the Mississippi River with just enough essential businesses nearby, yet secluded and quiet. There are some honeymoon-type cabins but we stayed in an adjoining duplex-type set up. One BR with fold out in living room, one full bathroom with shower, TV/VCR, movies you can borrow, A/C, and your own grill/picnic table. Comfortably slept 4 adults in each side. Communal fire pit with large swings and 4 person hot tub housed in a cozy separate building. Owners George and Sherry gracious and accommodating yet not intrusive. Plenty of room for kids to run around within sight. Watch out for the hickory nuts that bomb your cars!
reviews.title: What a find....less than 2 hours from Chicago!

likes.liked: — Short drive, spotless cabins, plenty of outdoors but not too remote
likes.disliked: — Could use full sized refrigerators in units

description: More than just lodging. Hickory Hideaway invites you to discover the diverse beauty of Northwest Illinois. Relax in the rustic setting of our 12 cozy cabins located on ten wooded acres just minutes from Lake Carroll. Enjoy our friendly atmosphere beside the bonfire or in our hot tub. A luxury cabin with kingsize bed, fireplace and whirlpool tub or a romantic getaway cabin or country kitchenette can accommodate everything from intimate parties to family reunions.
